column6: SIEGE BLOCKBUSTER TIE-IN!! Round three of Thunderbolts vs. The Mighty Avengers! Here at the end of SIEGE, everything set in motion by Norman Osborn comes to a fiery resolution-like his prime black-ops force! It's the cataclysmic end of an era - that sets the stage for the next big chapter of the most unpredictable book ever!  Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Adi Granov | penciller:Miguel Angel Sepulveda | writer:Jeff Parker
